description: Carry thousands of books in the palm of your hand. The Kindle app is reimagined for Windows 8, providing a beautiful, easy-to-use interface that turns your tablet or PC into a powerful e-reader. Whether you are catching up on a bestseller during your commute or studying a textbook at your desk, Kindle for Windows 8 offers a seamless and immersive reading experience.
